---
name: planning-subtasks
interactive: true
description: Collects subtasks for a new feature or backlog item. Use this skill to prompt for and validate subtasks as part of planning workflows. Supports interactive mode for user input.
---

argument-hint:
/subtasks: |
Parameters: none
Action: Prompt the user to list subtasks (optional), validate input, and return the value.
Example: /subtasks
